Alternatively, if you're up for something a bit more suspenseful and complex, "The Shadows" might be right up your alley. This psychological thriller centers around a novelist who hits a young man, leading to a dangerous plot that could rival one of his own novels. Enjoy the ride!

Both "Lady in the Water" and "Taxi Driver" offer unique perspectives on the law and justice system, making them great recommendations!

In "Lady in the Water," a building superintendent discovers that a woman he rescues is actually a character from a bedtime story, leading him on an extraordinary adventure to protect her. Starring M. Night Shyamalan and Paul Giamatti.

"Taxi Driver" follows a taxi driver who becomes entangled in the dark underworld of New York City, seeking redemption and love along the way. Notable for its powerful performances by Robert De Niro and Jodie Foster.

If you're looking for a more unconventional take on the 'super' genre, "Suicide Squad" might also interest you. This film features a group of super-villains recruited by the government to save the world from an impending apocalypse, starring Will Smith among others. Enjoy the ride!
